quote: The past is called the past for a reason. If you are constantly looking behind you, your eyes aren't on the road ahead. You don't drive the car that way, so why should you live your life that way?
quote_letters: THE PAST IS CALLED THE PAST FOR A REASON IF YOU ARE CONSTANTLY LOOKING BEHIND YOU YOUR EYES ARENT ON THE ROAD AHEAD YOU DONT DRIVE THE CAR THAT WAY SO WHY SHOULD YOU LIVE YOUR LIFE THAT WAY
